item.title: The Genderbread Person version 4
item.description: A few hundred workshops, three years, and one book edition later, Iâ€™m happy to finally publish here my 4th version of the Genderbread Person. Check it out, download it, and share it with your educator friend who is still using v3.

item.title: The Genderbread Person version 2
item.description: Hundreds of comments, ditto emails, ditto Facebook messages and Twitter tweeters and in-person holla-atchas and I feel like Iâ€™m finally in a place to release this. I give you the new and improved Genderbread Person! (click for larger size) Depending on what you folks have to say after checking this out and reading the rationale below, Iâ€™ll be updating the Breaking through the Binary article and uploading a printer-friendly version of the new graphic.

item.title: The Genderbread Person
item.description: The Genderbread Person is an infographic that breaks down gender identity, gender expression, biological sex, and sexual orientation into an easy to understand visual. Itâ€™s been around in some form for many years, and this is my whack at making an inclusive, adorable, easy to understand depiction.
